ChallengePage.Title: Challenge
MagicalObject.Name: Magical Challenge Object
MagicalObject.Description: A magical object that changes according to the challenge you currently selected.
BreweryChallenge.IncludeBeerVegetablesOn: Can only buy seeds for plants that make beer
HermitChallenge.CanOnlyLeaveOnSunday: You can only leave the farm on Sunday
VineyardChallenge.IncludeFruitOnly: Can only buy seeds for plants that make wine
CannotBuyFromShop.Message: Cannot buy from {{shopKeeper}} because of challenge.
ChangeGlobalStock.AddRiceInFirstSpring: You can buy rice in the first spring
ChallengerMail.MagicalObjectMail: I've heard from non-questionable sources that you want to start new challenges?^^I, Challenger Charlie, welcome you to this new path in life.^^I've enclosed an object to help you. If you interact with it, it will help you with the creation of a new challenge for yourself.
ChallengerMail.GoalCompletedMail: I've heard from non-questionable sources that you finished your latest challenge.^^I, Challenger Charlie, congratulate you on this achievement!
ChallengerMail.MagicalObjectLostMail: I've heard from non-questionable sources that you lost this object. If you interact with it, it will help you with the creation of a new challenge for yourself.
ChallengerConfig.ButtonOpenMenu.Name: Menu Button
ChallengerConfig.ButtonOpenMenu.Descript: The button that opens the challenger menu
